record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 5140
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 5140 -- (Senate - January 29, 2008)

[Page: S457]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that H.R. 5140 is now here and at the desk.
Mr. President, I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 5140) to provide economic stimulus through recovery rebates to individuals, incentives for business investment, and an increase in conforming and FHA loan limits.

speaking.paragraph: I ask, Mr. President, that further work on this matter be terminated now, so I object to its second reading.
